TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InheritanceMappingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class InheritanceMappingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class InheritanceMappingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 對應 LINQ to SQL 應用程式中的繼承階層架構。

span.span: Maps an inheritance hierarchy in a LINQ to SQL application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一個指定每個對應的類別。One is specified per mapped class. 當您將對應繼承階層架構，請注意下列：Note the following when you map inheritance hierarchies: - 在階層中的所有類別都必須都對應至單一資料表中。All classes in a hierarchy must be mapped to a single table. - 繼承階層的資料表必須位於階層頂端的對應型別上宣告。The table for an inheritance hierarchy must be declared on the mapped type that is at the top of the hierarchy. 您無法從最上層的類別衍生類別中指定的資料表或對應的屬性。You cannot specify the table or mapping attributes in a class that is derived from the top class. - 您可以使用的介面，在階層中，但[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]未對應。You can use an interface in a hierarchy, but [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] does not map it. - 當您將對應的類別，但您可以查詢對應的類別時，您可以略過在階層中的類別。You can skip a class in the hierarchy when you map classes, but you can query against mapped classes only. 為了正確具體化，鑑別子碼值必須是唯一且符合資料庫中的值。For correct materialization, discriminator code values must be unique and match the values in the database. 鑑別子碼值，這個值不完全符合 （甚至是由大小寫） 的資料列會具現化該類別使用設定為`true`。A row with a discriminator code value that does not exactly match (even by casing) instantiates the class by using set to `true`. ## Examples 此範例示範繼承對應階層頂端，其中對應類別 (`Shape`) 是抽象的。This example shows inheritance mapping for a hierarchy where the top, mapped class (`Shape`) is abstract. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/vb/Module1.vb#1)] 下列範例示範包含未對應的類別。The following example shows the inclusion of unmapped classes. 您可以將未對應的類別放在階層中的任何位置。You can put unmapped classes anywhere in the hierarchy. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/vb/Module1.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets or sets the discriminator code value in a mapped inheritance hierarchy.

value.span: 這個值必須是使用者指定的值。

summary.span: 取得或設定鑑別子值不符合指定的值時，這個型別的物件是否會執行個體化。

span.span: Gets or sets whether an object of this type in instantiated when the discriminator value does not match a specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有其中一個屬性必須以宣告做為`true`。Exactly one of the attributes must be declared with as `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ Type { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定階層架構中類別的型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the class in the hierarchy.

value.span: 這個值必須是使用者指定的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用任何非抽象型別中繼承階層架構，包括根型別。Use any non-abstract type in the inheritance hierarchy, including the root type.
